Distribution. Russian Federation : Kaliningrad Province ( Hůrka 1984 ), Leningrad Province ( Markova 1938 ), Tver Province (new record), Vladimir Province (new record), Mariy-El Republic (new record), Mordovia Republic (new record), Sverdlovsk Province ( Orlov & Orlova 2010 ), Chelyabinsk Province (
Orlova et al. 2014b
), Novosibirsk Province (
Orlova et al. 2014b
; Farafonova & Gornostaev 2018 ), Khanty-Mansy Region (
Orlova et al. 2013
), Altai Region ( Orlova & Orlov 2015 ), Tuva Republic (new record), Irkutsk Province (Orlova et al. 2016), Buryatiya Republic (Orlova et al. 2016), Amur Province (new record), Khabarovskiy Region (
Medvedev et al. 1991
; Farafonova & Gornostaev 2018 ), Primorskiy Region (
Medvedev et al. 1991
; Farafonova & Gornostaev 2018 ; this paper), Sakhalin Province (Orlova & Zhigalin 2015). Europe (
Szentiványi et al. 2016
). Kazakhstan ( Polkanov & Medvedev 1997 ). Mongolia (
Scheffler et al. 2012
). Japan ( Hůrka 1984 ).
